t: Check out this Amazon review of Mattress Genie Adjustable Bed, Twin Size, Alternative to Hospital Bed, Perfect for Those Dealing with Acid Reflux, GERD, Post Surgery Recovery, Congestion and Snoring
s: We bought the Mattress Genie for my husband, who has sleep apnea, which cannot be treated with the CPAP. We have a foam mattress, so we cut it down far enough, the width of the Genie, so it raises his head of the bed up , while mine remains flat.
